meanings.definition: In a manner relating to veins.
meanings.sent1: The medicine was injected venously into the patient's arm.
meanings.sent2: Blood flows venously back to the heart through the veins.
meanings.sent3: The vampire drank the blood venously, savoring every drop.
meanings.sent4: The roads on the map were like veins, venously connecting different cities.
meanings.sent5: The blue veins on the back of her hand stood out venously.

meanings.definition: Through or by means of veins.
meanings.sent1: The nutrients were transported venously from the intestines to the liver.
meanings.sent2: The medication was administered venously through an IV drip.
meanings.sent3: The treasure was hidden venously within the intricate network of caves.
meanings.sent4: The information flowed venously through the network of underground tunnels.
meanings.sent5: The roots of the tree spread venously through the soil in search of water.
